name: Race the Darkness
description:
Reach the bottom of the dungeon and don't let The Darkness cover you.

== CONTROLS ==

WASD to move

LMB to attack (melee)

Step over to gain power-up from yellow pillar

== STORY ==

The Eldrich Darkness was cast away eons ego, but now it found its way back to your world. You are the only one who can cast it away again. Reach the deepest bottom of the dungeon, but beware: if The Darkness notices you, it will throw you back to the entrance...

== LICENSE ==

All the assets (not created by the team) are taken from free resources.
